raw: The impact of the coronavirus outbreak on Wall Street may worsen trading conditions for one of the world ’s most liquid and important assets : U.S. Treasuries .
replaced: The impact of the coronavirus outbreak on Wall Street  Wall Street may worsen trading conditions for one of the world ’s most liquid and important assets : U.S. Treasuries .

raw: So say strategists at JPMorgan Chase Co. , who warn that overwhelmed dealer - banks in an extreme scenario could be flooded with an extra $ 300 billion worth of U.S. government debt .
replaced: So say strategists at JPMorgan Chase Co. , who warn that overwhelmed dealer - banks in an extreme scenario could be That with an extra $ 300 billion worth of U.S. government debt .

raw: That could then challenge the repurchase market , a vital part of the financial system ’s plumbing , just months after the Federal Reserve was forced into actions to support it .
replaced: That could then challenge the repurchase market , a vital part of the financial system ’s plumbing , just months after the Fed was forced into actions to support the repurchase market , a vital part of the financial system ’s plumbing .

raw: Global financial centers are grappling with the implications of the outbreak , with New York and London seeing “ split ” operations as big banks and dealers divide their workforces and instruct traders to work from home .
replaced: Global financial centers are grappling with the implications of the coronavirus outbreak on Wall Street , with New York and London seeing “ split ” operations as big banks and dealers divide big banks and dealers workforces and instruct traders to work from home .

raw: Business - continuity disruptions could damp liquidity , contributing to extreme moves in reaction to unexpected developments and worsening what ’s already been a turbulent ride for investors .
replaced: Business - continuity disruptions could damp liquidity , contributing to extreme moves in reaction to unexpected developments and worsening what ’s already been a turbulent ride for investors .

raw: “ Though the world is much more focused on market risk at the moment , it is important to bear in mind that we also in the early stages of the first large - scale operational - risk episode , ” JPMorgan analysts led by Joshua Younger wrote in a note .
replaced: “ Though the world is much more focused on market risk at the moment , it is important to bear in mind that we also in the early stages of the first large - scale operational - risk episode , ” JPMorgan  The analysts wrote in a note .

raw: “ Liquidity overall could also suffer , with some signs of emergent stress already apparent and transaction costs in even benchmark Treasuries significantly higher than even prior episodes of stress . ”
replaced: “ Liquidity overall could also suffer , with some signs of emergent stress already apparent and transaction costs in even benchmark Treasuries significantly higher than even prior episodes of stress . ”

raw: The analysts have been pointing to signs of strain in the U.S. Treasury market , including wider bid - ask spreads and a rise in the general collateral rate for repo transactions .
replaced: The analysts have been pointing to signs of strain in the Treasury market  Treasury market , including wider bid - ask spreads and a rise in the general collateral rate for repo transactions .

raw: Yields on benchmark 10 - year U.S. Treasuries dropped sharply in recent weeks , reaching a record low of 0.31 Monday as investors herded into the safety of government debt amid the worst Wall Street sell - off since the global financial crisis .
replaced: Yields on benchmark 10 - year U.S. Treasuries dropped sharply in recent weeks , reaching a record low of 0.31 Monday as investors herded into the safety of government debt amid the worst Wall Street sell - off since the global financial crisis .

raw: In October 2014 , a sudden “ flash ” rally shocked traders and prompted U.S. regulators to investigate the price action .

replaced: That then prompted the Fed to unveil billions of dollars worth of liquidity support for the vast repo market , where Treasuries are a crucial form of collateral for loans among financial institutions , , in an initiative still under way .

raw: “ We are already seeing market - making severely disrupted , and to the extent that logistical frictions prevent ‘ human ’ traders from providing a backstop , liquidity - transaction costs can stay very high compared to even recent history , ” the JPMorgan team said .
